suppress.notes: CVE-2018-1258: we do not use Spring Method Security, so this does not affect us. see https://pivotal.io/security/cve-2018-1258. we are on latest Spring Framework version : 5.2.2.RELEASE : https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-framework/wiki/Spring-Framework-Versions
We are on latest version , these are coming form mvn:pkg
Transitive dependency of spring boot version
We are currently using wiremock lib to support functional Tests, as a transitive dependency we are having Jetty Lib which is having this CVE
This suppress specific cve for tomcat-embed-core-9.0.33.jar and tomcat-embed-websocket-9.0.33.jar
Jetty jar vulnerability 9.4.27 Need to suppress, This is transitive dependency coming from properties-volume-spring-boot-starter project which is under reform
file name: junit-4.13.1.jar Awaiting patch for Junit : https://deb.freexian.com/extended-lts/tracker/CVE-2020-15250
Hibernate core 5.4.12 related issue, its transitive dependency coming from spring boot starter JPA
HTTP Client 4.5.11 suppression, root cause and fix needs to be carried out separately
jackson-databind 2.10.0 suppression, its transitive dependency coming from spring boot
tomcat-embed-core 9.0.33 suppression, root cause and fix needs to be carried out separately
Launch-darkley jar uses guava@28.2-jre as an internal library and it is not exposed outside. Since it cannot be upgraded, this supression is added.
This CVE is related to file type tag parsing. However, the associated CVE seems to be a false positive on the lang-tag jar.
